headline: Coterra Energy Reports 2025 Results, Provides 2026 Guidance, and Announces Quarterly Dividend
summary: HOUSTON, February 26, 2026--Coterra Energy Inc. (NYSE: CTRA) ("Coterra" or the "Company") today reported fourth-quarter and full-year 2025 results, provided full-year 2026 guidance, and declared a quarterly dividend of $0.22 per share.

headline: Sempra Energy's Q4 Earnings Top Estimates, Revenues Fall Y/Y
summary: SRE tops Q4 EPS estimates but posts lower profits and tighter cash levels, even as it raises long-term earnings outlook through 2030.

headline: Devon Energy Merger Plans Signal Higher Cash Returns And Key Tradeoffs
summary: Devon Energy (NYSE:DVN) plans a 31% increase in its quarterly dividend following its merger with Coterra Energy. The company is also considering a new share repurchase authorization of more than $5b. These capital return moves are tied to the combined company that would emerge after the planned merger closes. For investors watching energy income names, Devon Energy sits at a share price of $42.62, with the stock up 10.3% over the past 30 days and 12.5% year to date. Over the past year,...

headline: Scotiabank Lowers Devon Energy (DVN) Price Target, Sees Balanced Risk-Reward Outlook
summary: Devon Energy Corporation (NYSE:DVN) is included among the 14 Best Affordable Dividend Stocks to Buy According to Analysts.
